answers.answer: I did about a month ago,  we knew there was a possibility I would have gd and it turns out I did.
What did they say about ur diet?

Eat fruit with each meal watch the cabohydrates I eat but honestly I still eat candy and stuff as long as it doesn't make my blood sugar spike then I'm okay. I stopped drinking soda and started drinking diet soda and unsweetened tea. At meals I eat veggies or fruit but cutting down on how much you eat at meals and break it down to six meals it helps
You have to watch how much fruit you eat because they do have a lot of sugars in them. Check portion sizes.
Yeah like when you want apples oranges fruits like that cut them in half and that's one portion

Yeah pretty much watch my carbs. But I went to the doctor today and he only wants me to check once a day and the check my fasting twice a week because my levels were so good!  I was so happy! But made me realize I need to watch what I eat for the sake of me and my baby! I have horrible headaches if I have no caffeine and to be honest the soda doesn't make my sugar go high.

question: Anyone get diagnosed with gestational diabetes?
